MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL16 and LL22 postcode areas of Abergele and Denbigh, affecting properties in Llannefydd, Llanfairtalhairn and surrounding areas. Due to a road closure in the area, locating the cause of the fault is taking longer than expected and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:30PM on 8th November 2020
